    • Method Detail

      • migrate

        public void migrate​(DatabaseLayout directoryLayout,
                    DatabaseLayout migrationLayout,
                    ProgressReporter progress,
                    String versionToMigrateFrom,
                    String versionToMigrateTo)
             throws KernelException,
                    IOException
        Description copied from interface: StoreMigrationParticipant
        Performs migration of data this participant is responsible for if necessary. Data to migrate sits in sourceDirectory and must not be modified. Migrated data should go into targetStoreDir, where source and target dirs are highest level database store dirs.
        Parameters:
        directoryLayout - data to migrate.
        migrationLayout - place to migrate to.
        progress - migration progress monitor
        versionToMigrateFrom - the version to migrate from
        versionToMigrateTo - the version to migrate to
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an error migrating.
        KernelException

      • migrateIndexProviders

        private void migrateIndexProviders​(DatabaseLayout migrationLayout,
                                   String versionToMigrateTo)
                            throws IOException,
                                   KernelException
        Throws:
        IOException
        KernelException

      • moveMigratedFiles

        public void moveMigratedFiles​(DatabaseLayout migrationLayout,
                              DatabaseLayout directoryLayout,
                              String versionToMigrateFrom,
                              String versionToMigrateTo)
                       throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: StoreMigrationParticipant
        After a successful migration, move all affected files from upgradeDirectory over to the workingDirectory, effectively activating the migration changes.
        Parameters:
        migrationLayout - directory where the migration put its files.
        directoryLayout - directory the store directory of the to move the migrated files to.
        versionToMigrateFrom - the version we have migrated from
        versionToMigrateTo - the version we want to migrate to
        Throws:
        IOException - if unable to move one or more files.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup​(DatabaseLayout migrationLayout)
        Description copied from interface: StoreMigrationParticipant
        Delete any file from migrationLayout produced during migration.
        Parameters:
        migrationLayout - the directory where migrated files end up.

      • upgradeIndexProvider

        public static SchemaRule upgradeIndexProvider​(SchemaRule rule)
